    • eventDispatcher

      Event dispatcher instance that shall be used.

    • failureThreshold

      CircuitBreaker.CircuitBreakerBuilder failureThreshold(int value)
      Number of subsequent errors that trip CircuitBreaker.State.OPEN.

    • failureTrackingPeriod

      CircuitBreaker.CircuitBreakerBuilder failureTrackingPeriod(int value, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Time span in which the subsequent errors must occur.

    • hardTrippingExceptionTypes

      CircuitBreaker.CircuitBreakerBuilder hardTrippingExceptionTypes(Class<? extends Throwable>... value)
      Types of exceptions that trip CircuitBreaker.State.OPEN instantly ignoring the failure threshold.

    • maxConcurrent

      CircuitBreaker.CircuitBreakerBuilder maxConcurrent(int value)
      Maximum number of issued permits at the same time while in CircuitBreaker.State.CLOSE.

      Default is Integer.MAX_VALUE indicating no limitation.

    • name

      CircuitBreaker.CircuitBreakerBuilder name(String value)
      The circuit breaker's name used for logging purposes.

    • resetPeriod

      CircuitBreaker.CircuitBreakerBuilder resetPeriod(int value, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Amount of time the circuit breaker stays in CircuitBreaker.State.OPEN before switching to CircuitBreaker.State.HALF_OPEN
